botan.codec.openpgp

OpenPGP Codec

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

string PGP_encode(const(ubyte)* input, size_t length, in string label, in HashMapRef!(string, string) headers);
Params:
const(ubyte)* input the input data
size_t length length of input in bytes
string label the human-readable label
HashMapRef!(string, string) headers a set of key/value pairs included in the header

string PGP_encode(const(ubyte)* input, size_t length, in string type);
Params:
const(ubyte)* input the input data
size_t length length of input in bytes
string type the human-readable label

SecureVector!ubyte PGP_decode(DataSource source, ref string label, ref HashMapRef!(string, string) headers);
Params:
DataSource source the input source
string label is set to the human-readable label
HashMapRef!(string, string) headers is set to any headers

Returns:
decoded output as raw binary

SecureVector!ubyte PGP_decode(DataSource source, ref string label);
Params:
DataSource source the input source
string label is set to the human-readable label

Returns:
decoded output as raw binary
